DOC.brief_summary: In order to evaluate the implementation for the recommendations about the patient care for atrial fibrillation in aged patients, a non-interventional study is performed retrospectively by comparing two approach of the focus in Cardiology Department and in Geriatric unit.
DOC.brief_title: First-line Treatment for Atrial Fibrillation in Cardiology and Geriatric Departments
DOC.criteria: having an atrial fibrillation cared in Cardiology department or in geriatric unit having a mitral valvulopathy, or a valvular disease with a surgery indication having a valvular prosthesis history of valve reconstruction
